login.title: Ramathani
login.description: Your spiritual companion for Ramadan. Sign in to track your quests and grow in consistency.

intro.slide1Description: Complete spiritual, mental, and physical quests each day and earn Barakah Points.
intro.slide2Description: Rise through levels and spiritual stations — from Ṣābir to Muqarrab — as you grow in consistency.
intro.slide3Description: Watch short inspirational videos and strengthen your connection throughout the month.
intro.slide4Description: See your rank and honour others who walk the path with you.
